_source.short_desc: This POS provides restaurants with the taste of efficiency! Track sales, train employees & take orders from anywhere using an iPad.
_source.long_desc: Promo: Our digital hospitality bundle is now only $99 per month. POS + Order Ahead + eCom for Resto + Payments +   1 free piece of hardware. Future-proof your business with Lightspeed Restaurant and its features like delivery, contactless payment & customizable floor plans for social distancing. With Lightspeed powering your restaurant, you can focus less on operations and more on personalizing your service to increase customer satisfaction.
_source.target_audience: Lightspeed's functionalities are aligned with restaurateurs' priorities. It simplifies day-to-day tasks so you're free to focus on what matters: business growth and customer experience.

related_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
related_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify FOH busywork while growing your following with our high-intent network, so you can focus on the guest.
related_products.features: Yelp Guest Manager helps restaurants manage all of their front-of-house operations across the entire dining experience through one fully integrated solution - by bringing together Yelp Waitlist, Reservations, Kiosk, Takeout, Table Management, online brand building and more into one product. Yelp Guest Manager combines Yelp's high-intent diner network with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations from takeout and delivery orders to dine-in seating.

related_products.short_desc: Revel Systems is a cloud-based iPad point of sale (POS) solution that is quick, intuitive and secure.
related_products.features: Revel Systems is a robust, cloud-based iPad point of sale (POS) solution that powers the ambitions of restaurants and retailers. A scalable solution, Revel can meet the needs of independent businesses with multiple terminals and 2+ locations, small, midsize, and large chains. Quick, intuitive, and secure, the Revel POS offers extensive in-house features and can integrate seamlessly with partners specializing in payroll, inventory tracking, customer relationship management, and other features.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful online portfolio effortlessly. Use a stunning, easy-to-use template to stand out as a creative professional.
related_products.features:
Stand out as a professional with a stunning, easy-to-use online portfolio for as low as $7/month. 

There's a reason why 9 out of 10 creatives choose Format.

Format helps photographers, artists, designers and creative professionals showcase their work with flexible, one-of-kind portfolios.

All website designs are responsive and mobile-optimized and can be changed before and after pages are added (unlike leading all-purpose website builders).

Start a free 14-day trial and save 50% today.

related_products.short_desc: Harbortouch provides point of sale systems for the hospitality and retail industries. Ask us about our FREE POS program!
related_products.features: Point of sale solution designed to help retail stores, restaurants, bars, nightclubs, cafes, and more manage labor, monitor sales, track inventory levels, and review financials to enhance the operational efficiency of businesses. The platform enables administrators to add discounts on products, refer  special requests by clients, use keywords to search items, and maintain a customer database on a unified interface. It also offers a built-in time clock, which enables leaders to manage employees.

related_products.short_desc: NCR Aloha is an end-to-end solution that helps restaurants increase efficiency, drive revenue and redefine their guest experience.
related_products.features: NCR Aloha is a cloud-enabled tech platform that helps operators embrace digital transformation to run every aspect of the restaurant, drive on- and off-premise revenue, streamline management and exceed guest expectations. With an all-in-one subscription model, core capabilities include fixed and mobile POS, contactless dining, analytics, online ordering, 3rd party delivery integrations and more. Used in thousands of restaurants worldwide, more staff are trained on Aloha than any other POS.

related_products.short_desc: Add online ordering to your restaurant website in minutes. Manage incoming orders, pickups, and deliveries from a simple mobile app.
related_products.features: Manage online ordering for pickup, delivery, and tableside service from a simple, elegant platform. Update menus and pricing, view sales reports, launch marketing campaigns across multiple restaurant locations from any web browser and integrate seamlessly with Oracle Simphony Essentials POS to truly accelerate your business. It's all made easy with GloriaFood. Create your free account and add online ordering to your restaurant's website in minutes.

related_products.short_desc:
Our mission is to keep locals thriving! 

We empower local pizzerias with the necessary ordering, operations, and marketing tools.
related_products.features:
Be in business for yourself, not by yourself.

Slice is a first-party system that focuses on optimizing your online ordering so you can have the advantages of a big chain but the freedom of an independent.

It's not enough to have only a sleek website (but Slice will build you a custom-made one for free when you join). Your restaurant needs to be present in every digital hot spot. From an app to TripAdvisor to Google, Slice makes it easy to discover, order, and reorder.

related_products.short_desc: Open source restaurant online ordering system that helps restaurants of all sizes manage online ordering, table bookings and more
related_products.features:
Open source restaurant online ordering system that helps restaurants of all sizes manage online ordering, eat-in ordering, table bookings, credit card processing, reporting, deliveries and more. 

TastyIgniter gives users full control over the management of their restaurant. Multiple menus can be created and managed, for different locations, meal times, or seasonal specials.

related_products.short_desc: Restaurant POS tool that provides sales analysis and operations through real-time alerts, gift cards, and caller ID information.
related_products.features: Restaurant POS tool that provides sales analysis and operations through real-time alerts, gift cards, and caller ID information.

related_products.short_desc: LINGA rOS? has a broad feature set built to serve QSR, full-service, bars, pizzerias, Bubble Tea Shops, Cigar Lounges and franchises...
related_products.features: Used by restaurants & franchises all over the world, LINGA rOS is the worlds first enterprise-ready cloud-based restaurant operating system that offers convenience, ease of use, and technology. Including a set of integrations such as Point of Sale, Loyalty Program, Inventory Management, Kitchen Display System, Online Ordering, Cloud Kitchen, Driver app, and QR Pay, LINGA restaurant operating system is an innovative response to the demand for a one-stop solution for restaurant owners.

Benefits like app-only specials, loyalty systems, promotions, coupon codes or exclusive announcements allow businesses to engage with their customers through relevant content and tailored offerings.

similar_products.short_desc: Scan, order & pay - simplify the Ordering and Payment Process for your event visitors so that they will not miss a minute.
similar_products.features: With CM.com Payments Platform and its Mobile Order Solution, the entire ordering and payment process is taken out of the event organizer's hands. Create your mobile shop, brand it, and present your mobile order page via a QR-code, link or in an app - here your visitors can order and pay seamlessly in a secure environment. With Mobile Order, you will enrich your visitors' experience and ensure that they enjoy their visit to your event, match, festival, or venue to the fullest.

similar_products.short_desc: Yelo is a one-stop solution to create your Hyperlocal marketplace like Ubereats, Instacart, etc. within 24 Hours
similar_products.features:
Yelo is a multi-vendor marketplace SAAS software solution for Hyperlocal businesses. Yelo provides the local entrepreneurs with a complete tech suite to run and automate their business operations: from ordering, delivery to marketing automation. 
With 50+ integrations in payments, marketing and accounting make Yelo, the most powerful multi-vendor marketplace software.

similar_products.short_desc: Hungrrr's online ordering system provides restaurants, takeaways and hospitality businesses with an ordering website and mobile app.
similar_products.features:
Hungrrr's online ordering system provides restaurants, takeaways and hospitality businesses with their own ordering website and mobile app. Our online ordering system comes complete with:

Table ordering and delivery functionality
Fully-branded app and website
Push notifications
QR code ordering
Loyalty programs
EPOS integration
Monitoring dashboard

We proudly create ordering websites and apps for restaurants, takeaway and hospitality businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Marketplace solution that helps businesses build white-labeled online stores, track orders and manage delivery networks.
similar_products.features:
Your brand. Your business. Grow with Redbox, a powerful online ordering and delivery platform which supports many models.

Online Marketplaces:
With Redbox you can easily pull together an online marketplace of many hand picked outlets.

Branded E-Commerce:
Redbox can also be used to power an app just for your brand.

It's not just about food:
Redbox is here to power whatever you need to deliver. Integrations into delivery networks and dispatch systems allow your products to get moving!

similar_products.short_desc: From payments to credit to fraud protection, PayPal Commerce Platform helps you meet your customers where they are.
similar_products.features:
Over 26 million businesses choose PayPal to power their online payments both home and abroad. With easy setup, world-class fraud and seller protection tools, youll be able to reach more buyers and driver higher sales with PayPal. Whether youre selling on your own website or on marketplaces or via social media you can receive and send payments anywhere in the world with your all-in-one business account for online payments
 
24/7 Fraud Protection - Easy Integration - Global Expertise

similar_products.short_desc: An all-in-one point-of-sale & payments system, Clover integrates the functions of a cash register, card payment terminal, & POS system.
similar_products.features: Clover is an all-in-one point-of-sale and payments system that integrates the functions of a cash register, card payment terminal, and POS system. As a cloud-based platform supporting a suite of devices, Clover makes it easier and faster than ever to run your business. Built-in capabilities allow you to simplify daily tasks, speed up transactions, engage customers, and accept the latest payments effortlessly. Clover also offers a robust App Market, with 300+ apps available and growing.

similar_products.short_desc: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier, while saving time and money.
similar_products.features: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier. Built to meet the unique needs of the restaurant industry, TouchBistro is fast, reliable, and easy to use, and has all of the features restaurateurs need to increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. By pairing innovative restaurant technology and dedication to customer support and success, TouchBistro has powered more than 29,000 restaurants globally!

similar_products.short_desc: talech is a cloud-based, Point of Sale software system for restaurants, bars, cafes, retail and service businesses.
similar_products.features:
You can help grow your revenues and improve your margins with talech Point of Sale. Its easy-to-use interface is simple for staff to use while powerful features give you the tools to deliver a top quality customer experience. Grow your sales with Online Ordering that takes no commission. 

Add/track inventory with ease; split, merge & customize orders; manage employees + labor costs; build loyalty with our built-in CRM platform and much more. Includes free, always on 24/7 support

similar_products.features: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Bar POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Bar POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Bar POS software gives management the tools they need to run successful bars and nightclubs. With Bar Point of Sale systems you can track staff time and attendance, prevent theft, and track usage and inventory. Most Bar POS applications will also provide cash control reporting and audit tools to keep your bar or nightclub profitable. For other options, take a look at the best Point of Sale software, Restaurant POS software, and iPad POS software on Capterra.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Order Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Order Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Order Management software enables the management of orders from initial acceptance to shipment of a finished good. These applications provide customized tools to match an operations workflow, business rules, integration needs, data capture requirements, merchandising techniques and multi-channel sales strategy. Order Management solutions also typically offer real-time integration with inventory control, order management, payment processing, marketing and customer relationship management, helping to optimize costs and increase efficiency. Order Management software is related to eCommerce software and Order Entry software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Point of Sale software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Point of Sale tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Point of Sale (POS) software automates the capture of financial and sales transactions. Retail POS systems are among the most sophisticated and powerful computer networks in commercial use. Point of Sale systems integrate core business functions such as sales tracking, accounts receivable, purchasing and inventory management across multiple registers or retail branches. POS software also provides the infrastructure for connecting retail locations with supply chain operations and upper management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant POS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant POS software offers point of sale solutions specifically for the restaurant and bar industries. This type of software provides ordering, billing, reporting, accounting, table tracking, and receipt printing capabilities for restaurants and bars. Hardware such as computers, monitors and printers is often included in the purchase of POS systems. Restaurant POS software is related to POS software and Restaurant Management software.

similar_products.features: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier. Built to meet the unique needs of the restaurant industry, TouchBistro is fast, reliable, and easy to use, and has all of the features restaurateurs need to increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. By pairing innovative restaurant technology and dedication to customer support and success, TouchBistro has powered more than 29,000 restaurants globally!

similar_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
similar_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase productivity and speed of service while reducing order errors with a lightning-fast and easy-to-use POS solution.
similar_products.features: We help you run your restaurant seamlessly, so you can focus on what really matters-creating exceptional experiences. Our completely customizable, easy-to-use POS solution streamlines the transition for your team. The user-friendly design speeds up checkout and simplifies menu management. Plus, you can make data-driven decisions with robust reporting and visual dashboards. And with our award-winning sales and support teams at your side 24/7/365, you'll have a true partnership you can count on.

similar_products.short_desc: Comprehensive  Windows IoT  POS solution for managing restaurants.  Free hardware available for most existing merchants.
similar_products.features: BrewPOS is a Windows IOT solution for restaurants designed to intuitively manage the daily functions for your restaurant. System arrives fully programmed.  Management features include  Payroll, EMV Chip Tabs, Employee activity tracking, Real time training, Extensive reporting, Automated discounting, Trade accounts, Gift cards, Tickets splinting, Customer head counts, Table management, Customer records,  Void Comp Discount Waste Override and Theft tracking system.  Extensive Emp permissions.

similar_products.short_desc: Build the Restaurant of tomorrow, today. Evolve your business with the future of POS technology.
similar_products.features:
Restaurant management for the future

Our Restaurant POS System will help you stay ahead in an evolving industry.

Easily connect to major ordering and delivery apps to create new revenue streams and meet customer expectations.

Track inventory, calculate costs and profit, simplify reordering and integrate with leading accounting software.

Leverage powerful sales reports on any device to boost profitability, reduce wastage and improve employee efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 POS and take-out/delivery app made for quick-service restaurants.
similar_products.features: The first POS made for quick-service and takeaway restaurants that bridges online and regular orders. MYR stops customer-loss during your rush and features fully-integrated ordering apps for takeaway and delivery.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Food Service Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Food Service Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Food Service Management software enables inventory control, purchasing, receiving and recipe management for both public and private food service operations. Organizations use these applications to manage their back office functions as well as their customer relationship and accounting needs. Food Service Management software helps to control costs, monitor inventory, and automate labor intensive tasks. Food Service Management software is related to Catering software, Food Service Distribution software and Restaurant Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top iPad POS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.

Find and compare top Point of Sale software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Point of Sale tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Point of Sale (POS) software automates the capture of financial and sales transactions. Retail POS systems are among the most sophisticated and powerful computer networks in commercial use. Point of Sale systems integrate core business functions such as sales tracking, accounts receivable, purchasing and inventory management across multiple registers or retail branches. POS software also provides the infrastructure for connecting retail locations with supply chain operations and upper management.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Restaurant Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Restaurant Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Restaurant Management software integrates and automates accounting, scheduling and inventory control for restaurants. Restaurant Management applications typically offer a broad range of features that encompass traditional business necessities such as accounting, customer contact information, supplier data and payroll as well as restaurant-specific requirements such as table reservation management, guest management and menu costing. These applications also integrate with point of sale solutions and onsite or online credit card processing systems. Restaurant Management software is related to Food Service Distribution software and Food Service Management software.

_source.short_desc: This EPOS provides restaurants with the taste of efficiency! Track sales, train employees & take orders from anywhere using an iPad.
_source.long_desc: Future-proof your business with Lightspeed Restaurant and its features like delivery, contactless payment & customizable floor plans for social distancing. With Lightspeed powering your restaurant, you can focus less on operations and more on personalizing your service to increase customer satisfaction.
_source.target_audience: Lightspeed's functionalities are aligned with restaurateurs' priorities. It simplifies day-to-day tasks so you're free to focus on what matters: business growth and customer experience.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform For SMB's! Create a Free Account
related_products.features: Get everything you need to manage and grow your business,  all from a singular platform  create your free account today to explore the platform and compare plans and pricing.

related_products.short_desc: Never miss a beat with CAKE Point of Sale for bars. Become more efficient at serving guests & increasE your profit margins.
related_products.features:
Equip your staff with a simple and intuitive Bar POS made specifically to help increase efficiency and streamline your operations during a busy night.

The workflow is made simple with speed screens designed for bartenders to reduce the amount of taps to place orders, split checks, and process the bill, while being able to pre-authorize credit cards to open new tabs.

Request a Call for a Free Demo Now!

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one point-of-sale & payments system, Clover integrates the functions of a cash register, card payment terminal, & POS system.
related_products.features: Clover is an all-in-one point-of-sale and payments system for bars that integrates the functions of a cash register, card payment terminal, and POS system. As a cloud-based platform supporting a suite of devices, Clover makes it easier and faster than ever to manage your bar. Built-in capabilities allow you to simplify daily tasks, speed up transactions, engage customers, and accept the latest payments effortlessly. Clover also offers a robust App Market, with 300+ apps available and growing.

related_products.short_desc: TouchBistro has been designed to meet the unique needs and specific demands of the bar and nightclub industry.
related_products.features: TouchBistro has been designed to meet the unique needs and specific demands of the bar and nightclub industry. Bar owners buy TouchBistro because they want a POS that can help increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. TouchBistro comes with 24/7 expert support from former servers, managers, & owners.

related_products.short_desc: talech is a cloud-based, Point of Sale software system for bars, cafes, retail and service businesses
related_products.features:
For bars, nightclubs, pubs or gastropubs, talech POS software helps to grow your revenues and improve your margins. Through its intuitive design, talech helps simplify operations and uncover insights to make better decisions. 

With a few clicks, merchants can do so much; track inventory with ease; split, merge & customize orders; manage employees + monitor labor costs; build loyalty with our built-in CRM platform  

talech is always there for you with free, always on 24/7 support

related_products.short_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant and bar management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
related_products.features: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant and bar management system. Built specifically for foodservice, Toast is remarkably easy to use. Toast customers can easily fulfill orders, update online and in-house menus, and manage staff payroll. With online ordering, advanced real-time reporting and loyalty programs built in, Toast eliminates the need to juggle multiple vendors and dramatically cuts costs.

related_products.short_desc: Whether you run a pub, restaurant, cafe or takeaway, get it working faster and smarter with a complete EPOS system.
related_products.features:
The Complete Bar POS System

On-site dining, takeaway, or delivery? You choose. Adapt and thrive with an EPOS system that makes it all possible.

Whether you run a pub, restaurant, cafe, or takeaway, get it working faster and smarter with a complete EPOS system.

Synchronise your front & back of house to increase sales and table turnover

Integrate with major food delivery apps to win more customers & drive revenue

Drive repeat business and loyalty via CRM & promotions

related_products.short_desc: iPad POS for Restaurants, Bars and Cafes. Complete restaurant and bar management system.
related_products.features: Upserve by Lightspeed is an industry-leading iPad POS used by thousands of restaurants to power exceptional hospitality. Specifically designed by restaurant people, Upserve merges an easy to use interface with powerful POS features to modernize and streamline your restaurant operations. Combined with Upserve's HQ and Upserve Payments, Upserve by Lightspeed creates the most advanced POS and restaurant management solution in the industry, purpose-built to improve guest experiences.

related_products.short_desc: Contactless, dine-in ordering and payment options, convenient handhelds for lightning-fast ordering and payments, and detailed reports.
related_products.features: Transform your bar operations with lightning-fast, easy-to-use POS and handheld solutions designed to speed up service and boost sales. We offer contactless, QR ordering and payment options, marketing & review management, loyalty programs, and so much more.

related_products.short_desc: Lavu's intuitive mobile POS and full-featured management platform are designed specifically to streamline bar & restaurant operations.
related_products.features:
As featured in Gordon Ramsey's Kitchen Nightmares!  STARTING AT $59/MO WITH FREE HARDWARE INCLUDED 
Keep customers happy and the drinks flowing with Lavu's  Bar POS system - made just for nightlife. Take advantage of bar management features such as tab pre-authorization, automatic happy hour, check split, table-side ordering, in-house payment processing, labor management, loss prevention, and more. Speedy service. Great nights. Faster Pours. Higher Profits.

related_products.short_desc: Harbortouch provides point of sale systems for the hospitality and retail industries. Ask us about our FREE POS program!
related_products.features: Point of sale solution designed to help retail stores, restaurants, bars, nightclubs, cafes, and more manage labor, monitor sales, track inventory levels, and review financials to enhance the operational efficiency of businesses. The platform enables administrators to add discounts on products, refer  special requests by clients, use keywords to search items, and maintain a customer database on a unified interface. It also offers a built-in time clock, which enables leaders to manage employees.

similar_products.short_desc: Arryved is an all-in-one mobile POS and hospitality management system built specifically for dynamic bars, taprooms and restaurants.
similar_products.features:
Arryved is the most trusted all-in-one POS system for food, drink, music, and hospitality spots. Built by industry experts and enthusiasts, Arryved's flexible system makes service easy so staff can focus on charming guests. Plus, with a full suite of customizable features, merchants have the freedom to experiment and identify what's best for business growth. 

Arryved offers simple pricing and world-class customer support 7 days/week, underscoring their commitment to scale thriving businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Run your bar at a higher level. See all your data, manage your menus, control labor from your smart phone.
similar_products.features: NO SOFTWARE FEES FOR THE FIRST TWO TERMINALS. All Included for free: Online ordering, Inventory control, theft mitigation, EMV compliant Bar Tabs, advanced check splitting, QR Code ordering and Payments, delivery management, advanced pizza functionality, couponing, tableside ordering, rewards program, automated happy hour, customizable reports, built in drink recipes & more! Nobody beats Rezku's value. IF YOU HAVE MORE THAN TWO TERMINALS USE UNLIMITED TERMINALS FOR JUST $99/MONTH.

similar_products.short_desc: Square for Restaurants powers front and back of house operations for your full-service, quick-service, or fast-casual restaurant, bar
similar_products.features: The Square for Restaurants Point of Sale platform powers your speed and flexibility across front and back of house operations for your full-service restaurant, quick-service restaurant, fast-casual restaurant, bar or brewery. Handle online ordering, menus, table layouts, cover counts, coursing, payment processing, real-time reporting, and more.

manage menus, inventory, kitchen ops, promos, loyalty, & more. Real-time analytics are included so you always have a pulse on sales, costs & staff performance. Simphony's open API & extensive cloud marketplace gives you unlimited flexibility & agility.
